Header: Atchuvely, Kopay and Chulipuram Pre-school Kids Visits Palali Airport
Content: Responding to a request made by teachers in the JDCSI pre-school in Atchuvely, Saraswathy in Kopay South and the YMHA pre-school in Chulipuram, Commander Security Forces – Jaffna (SF – J), Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi facilitated those kids to visit the Palaly airport in Jaffna on Friday (3). Refreshments were offered to all 262 pre-school students, teachers and parents of the students of all 3 schools by the Army.
